quest.name: Jhammel and Hide
journal: Godafre has a tall favor to ask of you.
objectives: Deliver the jhammel hides to Godafre.

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: Ah, my tight-lipped friend! Retrieving that tobacco for me really helped me out, but I have another favor to ask if you're willing...

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: You know what a jhammel is, don't you? Tall leaf-eaters? Long necks? Look around, and you can probably spot one now.

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: They seem docile enough, aye, but a kick from one of those massive legs will send most ordinary folk sailing into the nether-realm. And I consider myself fairly ordinary.

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: You, on the other hand, seem the type who can shrug off a hoof or two to the face. Do you think you could take down some of those towering beastkin, and gather me three of their hides...?

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: Head westward, and you'll soon come across the jhammels' grazing grounds. Three of their huge hides should be enough to get me started...

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: Didn't get yourself trampled, then? Let's have a look at what you've brought...

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: Ah, now these are some high-quality hides. Once I've cleaned and cured them, I can craft them into armor for the Resistance troops.

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: When I wasn't busy lugging things around, the Garleans would send me to the factory and make me sew their unnatural fibers into uniforms. Now, at least, I can put those skills to use for my countrymen instead.

dialogue.name: GODAFRE
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, I'm almost ready to stand on my own two feet. You'll still be in town for a little while yet, won't you...?
